text: @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump  Hey, #POTUS,  if you don't believe in testing why do you test everyone at the White house? If you are willing to put all Americans at risk at least have the courage and decency do put yourself in same situation. NO #COVID19 testing in the #WhiteHouse.
